Meta_Tags.title: Filo | Press & Media
Meta_Tags.description:
Filo s.r.l. is an Italian Company on the IoT field based in Rome, Italy.
We program, develop, build and sell products that helps people in their daily life hobbies.

Block_1.title: Press Kit
Block_1.description: Filo is not just a little device, it is a incredibly smart way to find your things. Simply attach this cool Bluetooth tracker to your valuables and find it with our user-friendly Filo app. You can also use Filo to find your phone. By downloading our press kit you will find a more information including a product presentation, product images, and logos.

Block_2.title: Press Kit & Media Inquiry
Block_2.description_0: If you’d like to post a story, news article or blog about Filo, please contact us
Block_2.description_1: and we’ll provide you with all the necessary information that you may need.
